amendment.description: To require a plan to modernize the nuclear security enterprise.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3405 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3405 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 3748. To require a plan to modernize the nuclear security enterprise.
